titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 511) to pledge the faithful support of Congress to members of the United States Armed Forces serving in harm's way.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H2676-2677)
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Johnson, Sam. Petition No: 110-1. (Discharge petition text with signatures.)

bill.summary:
3/7/2007--Introduced.
Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H. R. 511) to pledge the faithful support of Congress to members of the United States Armed Forces serving in harm's way.
